The article was flagged on Facebook: s fake news list, indicating that it had a high number of shares and potentially misleading information.
The claim originated from a website call: com, which had copied and pasted the story from FreedomJunkshun.com, a site known for publishing absurd news stories.
FreedomJunkshun: com explicitly states that it uses fictional content and should not be considered as a reliable source of information.
The claim of J: T. Brown being fired by the Tampa Bay Lightning was proven false as Brown is still listed on the team roster and was only a healthy scratch for their last game.
